title: My Man Godfrey 1936 (Comedy, Drama film) William Powell, Carole Lombard, Alice Brady

sources.title: My Man Godfrey 1936 (Comedy, Drama film) William Powell, Carole Lombard, Alice Brady
sources.description:
From Rags to Riches and Back Again...! When High Society Meets the Streets.
Homeless man Godfrey Smith's life takes a surprising turn when he becomes a butler for a dysfunctional rich family. His mysterious past and unassuming wisdom not only help mend their fractured lives but also lead to unexpected love and redemption.

Original title: My Man Godfrey 1936 
This film is available with Italian, Portuguese & Spanish audio.
Subtitles are available in many more languages.


Black & White original version: https://youtu.be/4Vxa1wZ0I5Q

Director: Gregory La Cava
Writers: Morrie Ryskind, Eric Hatch, Zoe Akins
Stars: William Powell, Carole Lombard, Alice Brady
Genres: Comedy, Drama, Romance


02:27  A quirky scavenger hunt takes a hilarious, unexpected twist.
08:25 -A wealthy family’s discovery of a homeless man sparks chaos and comedy.
15:22  A new butler meets the eccentric and unpredictable Bullocks.
30:27  The Bullock family’s absurd antics reach new heights of confusion.
37:54  Godfrey, the mysterious butler, starts to reveal his true self.
45:02  A lavish party spins into a whirlwind of drama and wit.
51:26  A missing pearl necklace ignites suspicion and comedy.
1:06:38  The family’s dynamic with Godfrey highlights class tensions.
1:23:16  Financial ruin brings shocking revelations and Godfrey’s departure.
1:28:36  A chaotic, unlicensed wedding plan leads to comedic disaster.
